channel.title: Euan Semple on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Euan Semple on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Innovative approaches to creating the learning organisation - Euan Semple
item.description: ES - Euan Semple Using social media ES I grew up in this part of the world and my father was Head of Computer Systems for Strathclyde region, so for a long time I heard all the moans and groans of working in local authorities and all the sort of stuff he had to deal with in the seventies and eighties, combined with his experiences of computer and delivering computing to people.
